i like your class,but the range is too wide to prepare for the test。
I hope that you can discuss more about American history..這門課適合想練習英文聽力的同學選修。
我們班上有超過一半是英文白痴，老師可能要考量到他們在英文方面根本是啞巴，老師可以考慮如何增加學生回答誘因。

Thank you, teacher. You are always nice, earnest and patient. However, many of us are poor at our English or cannot pay attention to your class. I am so sorry about that. I think essay can help us learn more in your class!
Thanks a lot!
